attributes.action: Allow Gurkhas who retired from the services, both before and after 1997 to live in Britain, with equal pensions to British servicemen. Once these details are changed the medals that have been returned to the Government must be returned to those who earned them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently Gurkha's who retired before 1997, irrespective of their service to this country, are being deported. 
The Gurkha's have fought along side Britain for many years and without them many more of our troops would have lost their lives.
It is time we showed our true friends the respect that they deserve, to live in this country that they have fought and many have died for.

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Gurkha-soldiers/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
